```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tmaptools)
mesh1 = st_read("/home/rstudio/class/test/mesh1.shp")

pop = read.csv("/home/rstudio/class/test/tokyo_1months.csv", encoding="UTF-8")
class(pop$Name)
class(mesh1$Name)
mesh1_pop  = pop %>% mutate(name_1 = as.character(Name)) %>% 
  left_join(mesh1, by = c("name_1" = "Name"))

mesh1_pop2 = st_as_sf(mesh1_pop, crs=st_crs(mesh1))
breaks = c(0, 1, 10, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 800, 1000, 1200, 1400) * 100
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(mesh1_pop2) + 
  tm_polygons(col = "population", breaks = breaks)
```
